trans-unit.source: Identifies a type as an object suitable for binding to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object.
This class cannot be inherited.
Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> attribute to identify an object as suitable for use by an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object.

Design-time classes such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> attribute to present suitable objects to bind to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/30386922-1e00-4602-9ebf-526b271a8b87).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property is set to `true` when you use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.%23ctor> constructor.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute"></xref> class and indicates whether an object is suitable for binding to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object.

Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> constructor to indicate to a design-time class such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class that an object should be excluded from the list of suitable objects for binding to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property is set to the value of the `isDataObject` parameter.
`true` if the object is suitable for binding to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object; otherwise, `false`.
Indicates that the class is suitable for binding to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object at design time.
This field is read-only.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.DataObject> field returns a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> object with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property set to `true`.

Represents the default value of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute"></xref> class, which indicates that the class is suitable for binding to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object at design time.
This field is read-only.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.Default> field defines an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> class initialized with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor, which sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property to `true`.
Determines whether this instance of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute"></xref> fits the pattern of another object.
This method determines whether this instance of <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> fits the pattern of another object.
An object to compare with this instance of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute"></xref>.
`true` if this instance is the same as the instance specified by the obj parameter; otherwise, `false`.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
Gets a value indicating whether an object should be considered suitable for binding to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object at design time.
`true` if the object should be considered suitable for binding to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value indicating whether the current value of the attribute is the default value for the attribute.
`true` if the current value of the attribute is the default; otherwise, `false`.
Indicates that the class is not suitable for binding to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object at design time.
This field is read-only.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.NonDataObject> field returns a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> object with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property set to `false`.
